about_the_game:
A team of heroes from around the world must UNITE to protect the earth from vicious alien invaders! This band of 100 Wonderful Ones works together using their fantastic abilities to create a variety of forms. Whether it be a giant fist or a sharp blade, they’ll use their wits and power to overcome the enemy’s pitfalls and perils! And the final member of this team of courageous heroes—is you.

To thank everyone who supported
The Wonderful 101: Remastered, we've released a demo with all of Operation 001!
You can also get Wonder-Bayonetta and a stash of items!
You can even transfer demo save data to the full game and continue!
This game is a demo version. Please note the following:
- Data from the demo can be used with the full version.
- Full version save data can't be used with the demo.
*Please update the full game before transferring save data.
detailed_description:
A team of heroes from around the world must UNITE to protect the earth from vicious alien invaders! This band of 100 Wonderful Ones works together using their fantastic abilities to create a variety of forms. Whether it be a giant fist or a sharp blade, they’ll use their wits and power to overcome the enemy’s pitfalls and perils! And the final member of this team of courageous heroes—is you.

To thank everyone who supported
The Wonderful 101: Remastered, we've released a demo with all of Operation 001!
You can also get Wonder-Bayonetta and a stash of items!
You can even transfer demo save data to the full game and continue!
This game is a demo version. Please note the following:
- Data from the demo can be used with the full version.
- Full version save data can't be used with the demo.
*Please update the full game before transferring save data.

name: The Wonderful 101: Remastered Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-7100 CPU @ 3.90GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.9GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630 (VRAM 1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps/Full Screen/Graphics setting "High"/HDR、V-Sync ON
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz (8 CPUs), ~3.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 (VRAM 3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Wonderful 101: Remastered, we've released a demo with all of Operation 001! You can also get Wonder-Bayonetta and a stash of items! You can even transfer demo save data to the full game and continue!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
